pr_title: [plugin-saucelabs] Add session link for SauceLabs jobs

timeline.message: [plugin-saucelabs] Add session link for SauceLabs jobs

timeline.bodyText: it's not util, it's for reporting
timeline.author: valfirst
valfirst
valfirst

timeline.message: [plugin-saucelabs] Add session link for SauceLabs jobs

timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: reporter makes me thinking about report module and asking question why reporter thing does in selenium extension, but when we name the package session we like make a reference to selenium session which is suitable for the extension-selenium module
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText:
no, the goal of this class is to provide the data for the report, as for session - we don't manage sessions, the session is just a data

why reporter thing does in selenium extension

because it's a test automation solution, which includes reporting, logging and etc. and each module can report, log and etc.
replies.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: I didn't mean managing sessions, but what we do here is providing link to remote selenium session and this can be used not only for reporting
replies.author: uarlouski

timeline.bodyText: you can replace getTestCloudName() with constructor parameter and generate this string once
timeline.author: valfirst
